SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: GLOBAL DEVELOPMENT - IN-COUNTRY POLIO ERADICATION PROGRAMS; CONVENE GRANTEES TO PROMOTE COLLABORATION, IMPROVE PROGRAMS & STRENGTHEN THE GRANTEE NETWORK; SUPPLY CHAIN IMPROVEMENT STUDIES IN MULTIPLE COUNTRIES; ASSIST ORGANIZATIONS IN DEVELOPING INNOVATIVE FINANCING MECHANISMS & PRICING STRATEGIES TO IMPROVE GLOBAL ACCESS TO VACCINES, ESSENTIAL MEDICINES AND FAMILY HEALTH PRODUCTS; SUPPORT GRANTEES IN CREATING PLANS FOR INTRODUCING HEALTH CARE & VACCINATION PROGRAMS & FOR RESPONDING TO WIDESPREAD HEALTH CRISES & PANDEMICS; POLIO GPS TRACKING AND ANALYSIS; STRATEGIC PROJECT MANAGEMENT; STRATEGY SUPPORT; EVALUATION, COMMUNICATION AND ADVOCACY SUPPORT.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: GLOBAL HEALTH - DISCOVERY, DEVELOPMENT, AND DELIVERY OF HIGH IMPACT GLOBAL HEALTH INTERVENTIONS. ENGAGE WITH NON-PROFIT, PUBLIC, AND COMMERCIAL PARTNERS TO IDENTIFY NOVEL PLATFORMS, PROCESSES, AND TECHNIQUES THAT ACCELERATE THE TIMELINE, REDUCE COST, AND REDUCE RISK FOR INTRODUCTION OF NEW AND AFFORDABLE VACCINES, MEDICINES, DIAGNOSTICS, AND DEVICES FOR DISEASES OF HIGH BURDEN IN THE DEVELOPING WORLD. ADVISE GLOBAL HEALTH GRANTEES IN DEVELOPING IMPACTFUL ADVOCACY AND COMMUNICATIONS STRATEGIES. CONVENE GLOBAL HEALTH GRANTEES TO SHARE RESEARCH FINDINGS, INNOVATIONS, AND BEST PRACTICES IN NUMEROUS AREAS OF GLOBAL HEALTH AND MEDICINE.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description3Txt: GLOBAL GROWTH & OPPORTUNITY - DEVELOP A NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT WILL INCREASE THE EFFICIENCY, EFFICACY, & AFFORDABILITY OF EMPTYING PIT LATRINES & SEPTIC TANKS; CONVENE GRANTEES TO PROMOTE COLLABORATION, IMPROVE PROGRAMS & STRENGTHEN THE GRANTEE NETWORK; SUPPORT DISCOVERY AND DEVELOPMENT STUDIES ON AGRICULTURAL VALUE CHAINS FOR LIVESTOCK & CROPS; UNDERSTANDING FINANCIAL MARKETS AND DIGITAL SERVICES IN MULTIPLE COUNTRIES; UNDERSTANDING OF PATHWAYS TO ACCELERATE PROGRESS FOR WOMEN AND GIRLS; STRATEGIC PROJECT MANAGEMENT; STRATEGY SUPPORT; EVALUATION, COMMUNICATION AND ADVOCACY SUPPORT.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description4Txt: GLOBAL POLICY AND ADVOCACY - ACTIVITIES TO CULTIVATE NEW STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIPS AND TO ENCOURAGE INCREASED PRIVATE FUNDING FOR GLOBAL HEALTH AND GLOBAL DEVELOPMENT IN THE US AND ABROAD; ACCELERATE PROGRESS TOWARDS SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS; CONVENE GRANTEES TO PROMOTE COLLABORATION, IMPROVE PROGRAMS & STRENGTHEN THE GRANTEE NETWORK; SUPPORT GRANTEES IN DEVELOPING IMPACTFUL ADVOCACY AND COMMUNICATION STRATEGIES.

SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description1Txt: IMMUNOCORE LIMITED - A CONVERTIBLE DEBT (TREATED AS EQUITY) PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT OF TB AND HIV PROGRAMS AND SECURE ACCESS TO NOVEL IMMUNOTHERAPY PLATFORM TECHNOLOGY.
SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description2Txt: EASTSIDE PREPARATORY SCHOOL - A DEBT PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO SUPPORT THE ACQUISITION OF LAND AND CONSTRUCTION.

AllOtherProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Desc: ABRAAJ GROWTH MARKETS HEALTH FUND L.P. - A DIRECT EQUITY FUND PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO BRING ACCESSIBLE, AFFORDABLE, QUALITY PRIVATE HEALTH DELIVERY TO UNDERSERVED POPULATIONS IN AFRICA AND SOUTH ASIA.

VISTERRA, INC. - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO DEVELOP A PLATFORM USEFUL FOR UNDERSTANDING AND CHARACTERIZING PROTEINS AS 'NETWORKS' OF AMINO ACIDS, ENABLING THE IDENTIFICATION OF UNIQUE EPITOPES - CRITICAL TO STRUCTURE, FUNCTION AND THE DIRECTED DESIGN OF ANTIBODIES.
ACHAOGEN INC - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT OF AND SECURE ACCESS TO MONOCLONAL ANTIBODY ("MAB") DISCOVERY PLATFORM.
KYMAB - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT IN EARLY STAGE ANTIBODY DISCOVERY COMPANY BASED IN CAMBRIDGE, UK SPUN OUT OF THE SANGER INSTITUTE.
ARSANIS INC - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO SUPPORT THE DEVELOPMENT OF AND SECURE ACCESS TO STAPHYLOCOCCUS AUREUS (S. AUREUS) ANTIBODY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM.

CHARTER FUND INC DBA CSGF FACILITY FUND III, LLC - A DEBT PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO PROVIDE LOW-INTEREST SUBORDINATED FINANCING FOR HIGH-PERFORMING AND HIGH-POTENTIAL CHARTER SCHOOL OPERATORS FOR FACILITIES THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY.

SERA PROGNOSTICS - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO DEVELOP AN AFFORDABLE AND ACCESSIBLE PRETERM BIRTH DIAGNOSTIC THAT WILL BE EFFECTIVE FOR USE IN DEVELOPING COUNTRIES TO IMPROVE OUTCOMES FOR PRETERM INFANTS.
CLINVET INTERNATIONAL (PTY) LTD. - A DEBT PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO BUILD AND SUPPORT OPERATIONS OF BSL-2+ (BIOSAFETY LEVEL 2+) PRODUCTION ANIMAL RESEARCH FACILITIES FOR CLINVET MOROCCO.
REACH PARTNERS II, LLC - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO INVEST IN AN EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY SEED FUND.
OWL VENTURES - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT IN A FUND TO SUPPORT EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY FOCUSED ON U.S. K-12 MARKET.
REACH - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT IN A FUND TO SUPPORT EARLY STAGE INVESTMENTS IN THE K-12 EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY SECTOR PRIMARILY THROUGH SEED STAGE INVESTMENTS.

AFRICAN AGRICULTURAL CAPITAL FUND LLC - A DIRECT EQUITY FUND PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO INCREASE THE AVAILABILITY OF CAPITAL TO EARLY-STAGE AGRICULTURAL ENTERPRISES WHOSE BUSINESS MODELS DIRECTLY ENGAGE SMALLHOLDER FARMERS IN SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA.

AFRICA HEALTH FUND, LLC - A DIRECT EQUITY PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENT TO DEVELOP A DOUBLE-BOTTOM LINE PRIVATE EQUITY FUND TO INVEST IN PRIVATE PROVIDERS OF HEALTHCARE TO THE POOR IN SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA.
